name: HLA Encoding Rules Test Suite 2019
description: This is a test to verify whether the HLA encoding rules are being used correctly.

testcases.description: Test if SuT encodes all updated attribute values according to CS/SOM. Test if SuT encode all sent interaction class parameters according to CS/SOM

Test if SuT encodes all updated attribute values according to CS/SOM. Test if SuT encode all sent interaction class parameters according to CS/SOM. In addition to basic HLA endoing, extended RPR encoding rules will be accepted
